title: Infinix Hot 10 Play (Morandi Green, 32 GB)  (3 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adaptor, USB Cable, SIM Ejector Pin, TPU Case, Protective Screen Guard, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 20.5:9 Aspect Ratio, 440 NITS Brightness, 90.6% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Eye Care Mode, 1500:1 Contrast Ratio
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: AI Dual Camera: 13MP (f/1.8) + Depth Sensor, Auto Scene Detection, Modes: Slo-mo Video, Bokeh, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, AR Animoji, AI 3D Body Shaping
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP AI (f/2.0) Selfie Camera with LED Flash, Front Camera Modes: AI Portrait, AI 3D Face Beauty, WideSelfie, AR Animoji
product_specification.Flash: Rear - Quad LED Flash | Front - LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, G-Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Photo Editor, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery, Battery Lab, Face and Fingerprint Unlock, Flow Pattern Design, Dual VoLTE
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV, MP3, Midi
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.HD+ Drop Notch Display: The Infinix Hot 10 has an immersive 17.32 cm (6.82) HD+ Drop notch display along with narrow bezels and an optimal aspect ratio so that you can enjoy an uninterrupted view of the screen. Thanks to the large screen-to-body ratio so that you can experience an edge to edge access of the immersive display. With 440 nits of brightness and its contrast ratio, your viewing experience will be exhilarating. You can also enjoy durable usage with NEG Dinorex T2X-1 glass protection.
product_description.13 MP AI Dual Rear Camera: Thanks to the 13 MP AI Dual Rear Camera with a 13 MP primary lens of f1.8 big aperture and a depth sensor along with Quad-LED flash so that every picture or video that you take make an impression. You can also enjoy slo-mo recording, Full HD video recording, Document mode, Bokeh, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, and Panorama mode so that you can shoot content that suits your liking. And, with Auto Scene detection, the phone can detect 9 different outdoor scenarios.
product_description.8 MP AI Selfie with LED Flash: This mobile phone is powered by an 8 MP AI selfie, f/2.0 aperture, and a dedicated LED flash so that you can take dazzling selfies. And, with a portrait and wide selfie mode, you can take selfies with ease. And, you can use the 3D Face Beauty mode, you can smoothen the skin, enlarge the eyes, and so on as per your liking.
product_description.Powerful Battery: Thanks to the large 6000 mAh battery and the Power Marathon Tech, you can enjoy extended usage and increase the battery backup by up to 25%. This enables you to enjoy up to 23 hours of video playback, 23 hours of web surfing, and much more.
product_description.Helio G35 Octa-core: This mobile phone has a 3 GB+32 GB memory variant and is also powered by 12nm Helio G35 2.3GHz Octa-core processor. You can use the Dual 4G SIM slot along with a dedicated SD card slot that can support up to 256 GB of storage. It also supports Dual VoLTE, VoWiFi calling, and also supports Bluetooth v5.0.
product_description.Eye-catching Design: Featuring a gem-cut texture design with a flow pattern, this mobile phone is aesthetic and eye-catching. Thanks to the rectangular camera module lens, the phone looks a lot more elegant. And, with a 2.5D glass finish on the back and a 2.5D curved glass on the front of the mobile phone and narrow bezels, you can enjoy the premium appeal of this mobile phone.
product_description.DTS Surround Sound: This mobile phone features DTS-HD Surround Sound so that you can enjoy a cinematic sound experience wherever you are. It’s equipped with various modes for gaming, video, and music, giving you an authentic sound experience.
product_description.Fingerprint and Face Unlock: You can use the multifunctional fingerprint sensor for heightened security. You can use it to not only unlock your phone, dismiss an alarm, and also accept calls. And, you can also choose to launch your favourite apps once you sync them with different fingers. You can use the Face Unlock feature to unlock your device in a jiffy.
product_description.XOS 7 on Android 10: This mobile phone ensures a smooth and fast software experience with XOS 7. It’s also powered by the Android 10 OS. And, with innovative features, such as Video Assistant, Wi-Fi share, Dark Theme, Game Mode, and more, your level of entertainment will know no bounds.

Back : like old 3MP camera. Do not expect photography.

Earphone : Not include.
OS 10 : Not able to upgrade 11.

Please add the following functionality that will help users to retain with infinix.
1. Dual app support should be added. Third party dual apps are filled up with too much ads and also slow.
2. dual space support should be there as MI (xiaomi) provides.
3. Messages: there is a bug when we try to send a contact number from an existing list by adding them in a message , it converts to MMS rather than SMS and does not send to the recipient, through an error.
4. Contact: it does not show group list field like family , friend etc,
5. Call Recording: Unable to record any call just because of its public announcement.
6. data usage status bar notification should be based on other mobile phones user interface.
7. Phone ringtone sounds do not have a separate profile as for music and notification. Whenever there is a call during earphone plug in, the ring sound is very high in the ear.
8. Alarm: timer don't have time tabs
9. Camera don't have a time stamp on photos
10. Gallery is not showing SD card camera photos on the main screen.
11. Fingerprint’s sensor takes a bit more time to read and open that particular app, and mobile phones also hang sometimes. .
12. It is filled with advertisements which are quite annoying, most of the time when we open a app it shows videos/image advertisements which are quite awkward.

pros.6000 mAh Battery: This device comes with a 6000 mAh battery and a power marathon technology gives a massive boost to the backup.
pros.17.32 cm (6.82) HD+ Drop notch display: The HD+ drop notch display is best and gives an awesome immersive experience. It comes with a massive 6.82 inch screen which is a plus point.

cons.Camera: The AI dual rear camera and 8MP front camera is bad and gives average performance.
cons.Performance: The octa core MediaTek Helio G35 processor does not perform as expected and is very slow.

summary.verdict: The Infinix Hot 10 Play is not a recommended purchase at this price segment.
summary.Additional Information: Supports freefire in high graphics, Supports VoWifi, DTS-HD sound, Multifunctional fingerprint.
